data.title: Oracle NetSuite ERP Software
data.meta_description: SAP Business One helps you streamline processes and gain insight into your business to act fast and make decisions. Attivo ERP
data.text:
BoyumIT

Boyum IT Solutions is a certified and multi-awarded SAP Gold Partner, passionate about helping partners and customers reach new levels of success with software solutions that expand SAP Business One’s possibilities and functionality.

With the Boyum Pack suite of horizontal modules for system customization, dynamic Outlook integration and Produmex – best of breed manufacturing management, warehouse management and scanning solutions – there is something for everybody in Boyum’s product portfolio.

Founded in Denmark in 1997, Boyum IT has been implementing and supporting ERP Software for more than 15 years. Since the beginning, the philosophy has been to offer professional users a great and safe IT solution with high reliability and security. Boyum IT has a presence in almost 100 countries, 7000+ customers and over 140.000 users.

Our vision is to inspire companies to achieve sustainable growth and a competitive advantage. Now and in the future!

WWW.BOYUM-SOLUTIONS.COM

Products:

Utilities

B1 Usability Package: The B1 Usability Package (B1UP) is an award-winning solution designed to enable you to customize and automate SAP Business One effortlessly, making it ready to face the most diverse scenarios and challenges.

B1UP brings a new depth of versatility to SAP Business One, ensuring a flawless user experience and giving you the competitive edge that you need to drive your organization to success.

B1 Print & Delivery: B1 Print & Delivery (B1P&D) automates the entire communication flow in SAP Business One. It enables employees to maximize their productivity by handling day-to-day repetitive communication-related tasks, such as emailing, viewing, printing, and saving documents and reports.

B1P&D also boosts team synergy by delivering customized messages through collaboration tools such as Microsoft Teams or Slack, as well as sending activities and internal messages within SAP Business One to your team members. All of this is entirely automated. Let B1 Print & Delivery take care of the work, while your team focuses on achieving their business objectives.

Manufacturing

Build – Cloud Apps: Product design and management – Supporting product development and production departments in launching new or evolving products, to get from idea to production quickly

Produce – Cloud Apps: Shop floor management – A collaborative workflow between production management and the shop floor, for enabling production planning and understanding work done

Inspect – Cloud Apps: Quality control application – Create consistent quality testing plans to measure the success of your production, the quality of your suppliers, and discover ways to improve

Warehouse Management

Produmex Scan: Comprehensive warehouse management solution for SAP Business One that can transform your logistics processes into finely tuned operations that drive productivity and profitability in your supply chain. The solution supports multiple warehouses and operators, processing high volumes of transactions all while maintaining high performance

Produmex WMS: Produmex Scan is a robust and reliable barcode scanning solution for SAP Business One that seamlessly automates warehouse and inventory transactions. The solution supports multiple warehouse operators, processing high volumes of transactions while maintaining high performance

WiSys Warehouse Management Software

WiSys was founded in 2004 by Bruce Hollinger, who also founded Macola Software. His intimate knowledge of the Exact Software platform helped turn WiSys into the go-to warehouse management solution for ERP platforms. Over the course of the past 12 years, The Attivo Group has worked hand in hand with WiSys on dozens of implementations for our clients. Their development and support team often serves as a seamless extension of our own team. It is our strong relationship with the entire WiSys team that allows us to collaborate on complex problems and find creative solutions.

WiSys warehouse management software is designed to help you take control of your entire supply chain. Integrating seamlessly with ERP software solutions, WiSys is a perfect compliment to lean your manufacturing and distribution efforts. Whether it be upstream activities or downstream activities, WiSys’ full compliment of modules can save you money and help you better serve your customers.

Tipalti

Complete, integrated processing for accounts payable

Tipalti is a global leader in payables automation and spend management, designed to seamlessly integrate into SAP B1 and your wider tech stack. Focused on minimizing the time your finance team spends on manual payables processes, while helping to speed up your financial close, Tipalti helps teams improve cash flow visibility, while alleviating the amount of manual work your team spends on the payables process. Many customers experience a cost savings of up to 80% of their accounts payable processing costs using Tipalti!

How ERP and Tipalti work together

Integrate into your business process

Designed to seamlessly integrate with your ERP system, Tipalti helps ensure that your payables process fits effortlessly into your financial operations, without holding your business back from scaling to the next level. Automate the receipt of accounts payable invoices and payment of your suppliers.

Global & Multi-Entity Ready

Future-proof global payables operations with the ability to manage complex, mutli-entity subsidiary structures, with reporting back to your ERP system. Offer True Global Payables with the ability to transact in 196 countries and 120 currencies.

Protect Against Fraud & Compliance Risk

Proactively prevent fraud with detailed payee monitoring; global capabilities, deep audit trails and notes help provide your business more control, while helping you mitigate risk exposure.

Want more info about Tipalti? Download the datasheet.

Enterpryze

Maximise your Margins with the Number 1 Inventory Platform for SME’s

The easy to use, powerful, cloud platform to help you manage your Stock, Customers & Suppliers all in one solution. Stop running your business with basic accounting and excel spreadsheets. Get an All in One cloud-software with CRM, Service, Accounting and Banking to streamline your business activities. Enterpryze is a revolutionary platform for growing SMEs looking to modernize and simplify business processes. They help SMEs by providing a fully integrated business management system (inventory, finance, sales, CRM, stock management, manufacturing, distribution, scheduling, expenses, reporting, services etc.) securely in the cloud. Enterpryze is one of the most trusted business management solutions. With thousands of users over the world. It is the perfect solution for your business to reach new growth heights.

Also, Enterpryze is completely compatible with SAP Business One, thousands of users all over the world who have connected the Enterpryze solution to their SAP Business One to extend the reach of their system, with a seamless integration.

CompuTec ProcesForce

While every company seeks to reduce expenses and improve efficiency, the logistics are often difficult for small and medium-sized businesses to streamline processes. To address this very common challenge, Attivo Group has partnered with CompuTec SA to offer the ProcessForce solution, which extends SAP Business One to handle complex manufacturing needs.

CompuTec SA – Advanced Manufacturing Capability for SAP Business One

CompuTec SA has developed multiple ERP, manufacturing and warehousing integrations that boost the prolific platform that is SAP Business One. Their expert knowledge in production processes have produced functionally rich, uniform and user-friendly solutions for their clients. ProcessForce delivers complex answers to multiple challenges in the production process and is currently deployed in over 350 SMEs. It also provides product data (traceability), production process management, quality control and complaint management.

CompuTec SA became and SAP Partner in 2006 and received Gold Partner status in 2009 and is currently the most awarded SAP Partner in Central and Eastern Europe, with customers in over 60 countries on 5 continents. Attivo Group is proud to be a valued partner of CompuTec SA.

CompuTec—ProcessForce & SAP Business One Success Story: Bosco and Roxy’s

Eralis

Providing quality job management and project management solutions for small to mid-sized businesses, Eralis Software has partnered with SAP and The Attivo Group to offer SAP-certified companion solutions for SAP Business One.

Many service-based businesses face common challenges every day, from tracking projects to staying within budget and minding every detail in between. Increase visibility and gain control of your costs, profits, and progress with Eralis Software and its many add-ons to streamline processes and much more.

Eralis Software Extends SAP Business One for Job Costing and Project Management

Eralis Software (formerly Enterprise Software), has been an SAP Business One Partner since 2006. They have developed full-featured job costing and project management solutions to extend the power of SAP Business One. They have enabled more than 400 customers around the world with Eralis, to solve unique job costing, scheduling and reporting challenges, as well as project management, project accounting and even rental equipment requirements.

The industries Eralis Software particularly enables include Commercial Sales & Service, Industrial Service, Trade Contractors, Engineering Firms, Management Consulting Firms and Software & Technology Firms. With offices and partners throughout the world, they are a recognized leader in the field of Job Costing and Project Management for SAP Business One.

To learn more about Eralis Software and how the Eralis suite of extensions to SAP Business One can solve your job costing and project management challenges, Contact Us.

Eralis Product Suite: Overview

Achieve IT

AchieveIT Solutions is a leading provider of SAP Business One based business management software. With Over 24 years in the ERP industry and helping companies worldwide organize their operations, AchieveIT provides businesses with the right softwaresolutions to support any needs and challenges of your business.

Achieve IT has been a Gold Partner of SAP Business One since 2005, and to implement and make the most of your SAP Business One software, Achieve It experts will assist you:

Strategic Planning

Provide Assessment of Business Needs

Handle Project Management

Provide Report Writing and Database Analytics

Offer Electronic Data Interchange to handle eCommerce

Provide Training and Comprehensive Technical Support Packages,

Collaborate on Custom Software Development.

Achieve IT also offers innovative software products that expand SAP Business which includes Resolve and Resolve+ Mobility.Resolve is a fully integrated application suite of distribution, logistics, and warehouse management software designed to optimize freight shipping and warehouse operations.

Achieve IT has partnered with the Attivo Group to provide you with the best-in-class support services for your SAP Business One software systems. Contact us to find out how we can bring streamlined and efficient operations to your distribution business
